document.full_text: teenage japanese golfer ryo ishikawa has pledged to donate all of his earnings this year to the relief effort for the victims of the march 11 earthquake and tsunami in his country.
document.title: ryo ishikawa to pledge all winnings to quake victims
lines_and_colors: teenage japanese golfer ryo ishikawa has pledged to donate all of his earnings this year to the relief effort for the victims of the march 11 earthquake and tsunami in his country.
